content: Auto-generated summary in the Text summary tab of IG is not listing out the changed binding in the profile. Is there any way to display changes in ValueSet binding? NoSummary.png
No, the summary tab currently provide limited information. We are discussing its utility and considering demoting or removing it altogether.
Ohh. I think this is really a good view for people who are not from a tech background. Rather it would be a good idea to improve it and provide more details.

Yes it would be nice if someone from the community would create and maintain a summary template (in liquid) that meets the approval of the community. This is not a trivial task or it would have been done already.

oh you couldn't do this logic in liquid. There's a great deal of code behind it. I'm certainly willing to make improvements to it, but there's considerable contention around it's value. @Eric Haas and @Lloyd McKenzie don't like it but lot's of people do, so I don't think it should be removed
I haven't been listing changed bindings in the summary - it could rapidly stop being a summary in any form

I don't think the summary tab has any value in its current form or even with bindings. I created full narrative summaries for US Core using a non-liquid template and code, but I only did the easy stuff, it became increasingly difficult to manage and expand to include the myriad of options and slicing that are available in SD. In the end was not worth it and nobody has missed it ... so far

with regard to a differential bindings and invariants - They should be rendered in the differential tab as tables under the tree instead, That has real value and I have a tracker to address that, so I would rather see that as a focus instead of the summary tab.
